original_text: For the Pharisees, and all the Jews, except they wash their hands oft, eat not, holding the tradition of the elders.
korean_text: (바리새인들과 모든 유대인들은 장로들의 전통을 지키어 손을 잘 씻지 않고서는 음식을 먹지 아니하며

sentences.original_text: For the Pharisees, and all the Jews,
except they wash their hands oft,
holding the tradition of the elders.
